body: Is it true that the "solve adjacencies" component can't identify overlapping surface like the "surface matching" function in OpenStudio? Does this mean that I need to do some manual work to split the overlapping surface before using this component? How to do it in Rhino if I must? See the example gh file below in which the overlapping wall between the two zones is not split separately, [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/oJI0y6HlVvRZtpCQ0Z4dJmTXPiMjAlQzjs5eRuZCPEfEOV8A4SEFt*VGLeUARt0*HRydAClKkoem9alj7ylS4v7yqT7H6Grr/Capture.PNG)
topic: "solve adjacencies" component can't identify overlapping surface?
